contentrichtext.text: '''Buffy''' may refer to: *[[Buffy the Vampire Slayer (disambiguation)]], various media on the TV series. *''[[The Buffy EP]]'', 1999 EP by Velvet Chain *[[Buffy coat]], a component of blood *[[Buffy (album)|''Buffy'' (album)]], a 1974 album by Buffy Sainte-Marie for MCA Records *{{mpl|2004 XR|190}}, trans-Neptunian object, tentatively nicknamed Buffy ==People== ;Given name {{given name|Buffy}} *[[Buffy Sainte-Marie]] (born 1941), folk musician and artist *[[Buffy Tyler]] (born 1978), Playboy Playmate *[[Buffy-Lynne Williams]] (born 1977), Canadian rower *[[Buffie Carruth]] (born 1977), American model and fitness instructor ;Nickname *[[Elizabeth Bowes-Lyon]] (1900–2002), the late queen consort of Great Britain, who had the nickname Buffy as a child *[[Darren Robinson (rapper)]] (1967–1995), also called Buffy, a member of the rap trio The Fat Boys *[[Dorothy Buffum Chandler]] (1901-1997), a late Los Angeles cultural leader, was nicknamed Buffy or Buffie or Buff ===Fictional=== *[[Motley%27s_Crew#Abel_and_Buffy|Buffy]], the sister-in-law of Mike Motley in the 1976–2000 comic strip ''[[Motley's Crew]]'' *Buffy Patterson Davis, a character on the 1966–1971 American television series ''[[Family Affair]]'' *[[Buffy Summers]], the title character in the ''Buffy the Vampire Slayer'' media {{disambiguation|given name}}
